website_summaries.verdict: The brand's pressed powder blush comes in a range of famous shades, including the cult classic Orgasm.
pros: NARS blushes are the standard by which other blushes are judged
Powder is silky and fine, with micro pigments for a buildable flush
Comes in 16 shimmer shades and one matte shade
Gets high marks for quality and ease of use
cons: Some users find there is too much glitter in the shimmer shades

customer_reviews.title: The blush I received looked exactly like it should so I put it away until the ...
customer_reviews.text: The blush I received looked exactly like it should so I put it away until the one I had was finished, which took a lot longer than I thought it would because there is so much great pigment in the real thing. When I finally started trying to use this that I bought on Amazon I saw that there is almost no pigment and I might as well have bought the cheapest drug store product there is. I am really sorry I bought this as it is a fake.
customer_reviews.author: valueforbabe

customer_reviews.title: Has glitter flecks...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know that this product leaves glitter on your face. I love the product quality and the color, but at my age I can't have little flecks of glitter on my face :-(
customer_reviews.author: ExecSec

customer_reviews.title: Photos Do Not Represent Color.  Don't Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: I wish I received the color as pictured. It was WAY off! So bright that it was useless. I don't return at that price level, so I gave it to a little girl to play dress-up. Because they can't accurately represent one of the most important features of their product, the color, I will never buy this again on line. Waste of time and money!
customer_reviews.author: Music Lover

customer_reviews.title: Pretty! I love the golden flecks in the blush 🍑
customer_reviews.text: I've heard so much hype about this particular blush. I decided to try it. It's very pretty and subtle. I like the little gold flecks in it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Begley

customer_reviews.title: Great color. Perfect amount of shimmer.
customer_reviews.text: Angelika. Great color. Nice little shimmer. Lasts. Just hate when the middle of the container gets worn out (before the sides) and you have to place your blush brush on the side of the container to get the blush out.
customer_reviews.author: BottomLine

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you're expecting illumination.
customer_reviews.text: I don't believe the product was authentic . It was dull and different from those I purchased from Nordsrom. I was totally disappointed & wouldn't have kept them, but didn't want to pay shipping; unfortunately I purchased 2. Never again will I purchase them from other than my local stores that carry Nars.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Staple in my makeup bag. I have olive skin color and what's deposited onto my cheeks not only is beautiful with my skin tone, but it's not overbearing. Can look very natural or quite done up depending on how much is used.
customer_reviews.author: Avid online shopper

customer_reviews.title: prettiest blush ever
customer_reviews.text: this is my all time favorite blush! the coral w/ gold flecks looks good on any complexion & any age group. i mistakenly purchased the new Orgasm X and it is terribly unflattering. i have worn this since it came out about 10 yrs ago...but now i am worried that it has been discontinued. i was pleased w this purchase. it arrived on time & was in perfect condition. so pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Horton Roach

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: With everyone raving about this product I had to try it. I am so glad I found it on Amazon for a lot less than I would have paid elsewhere. The seller shipped it immediately. I blinked and it was here! I love the shade and the shimmer and am thrilled to add this to my makeup bag. The pigment is very intense so you barely need a swipe and the hint of shimmer adds the perfect level of glow. It works well so far with a variety of makeup looks and I think it is a very versatile product. Plus the case is so sleek. I want to show it to everyone. Of course, I don't. Lol!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting blush
customer_reviews.text: Really like NARS blush. Have tried several of their blush colors exclusively for 15 years. Highly recommend product to anyone considering it. Lasts a long time so you get your moneys worth.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Anne

customer_reviews.title: "I <3 Amour!
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of this blush. It is worth the price. Color is great although I wish that I would have tried the color named Orgasm-seems as though that is the popular choice. I guess I didn't want to be like everyone else. Now I am wishing I would have gone with the Orgasm-not that I don't like this color, it just seems like it might have been a better choice for my complexion. Highly recommend Nars-very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: BB in PA

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as shown
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Came nicely boxed and in perfect condition. Color is great with a slight hint of glitter.
customer_reviews.author: REINA COLLARD

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not really worth the added expense compared to drugstore brands.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try this blush because all the fashion magazines usually laud this as THEE blush product to use. Up until now, I've used the mineral blush powder from the drugstore brand, Physicians Formula. The NARS has a slight 'sparkle' to it that my other blushes don't have. It's a nice color and has a smooth finish. However, I don't think it's any better than the drugstore brands and the price sets it apart even more. I personally probably won't purchase it again, but it was worth the try.
customer_reviews.author: Shonna O'Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Just the color I wanted - sort of a pinkish coral, for lack of a better description.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it much, but it went on nicely with my big fluffy makeup brush! I wear kind of a rose lipstick and sometimes more of an orangy-coral. It goes well with either of them.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen K. Ditmer

customer_reviews.title: This blush is great!
customer_reviews.text: It seemed to be faltering to anybody but to be specific to ME! Nice light blush which is not fading, I high recommend it. Patti Cleary
customer_reviews.author: Kirby Arrow

customer_reviews.title: The best blush I have ever tried.
customer_reviews.text: NARS Orgasm blush gets five stars from me for it's pure beauty. I have everything from Benefit , Estee, Too Faced, to drugstore and I have never seen a color this gorgeous on skin. I do not have white pale skin, but a shade tanner tone and it is amazing. I have hundreds of dollars worth of different blushes from Havanna to Clinique and nothing looks as natural, beautiful and flawless as NARS Orgasm. The pigment is perfect, it's an easy to blend shade and the blush itself is in a fantastic compact and plenty of it. I will order more just to have on hand!
customer_reviews.author: Feistybelle

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blush! I was talked into it by the sales lady at the Sephora store. (I only say “talked into it”, because I wasn't thinking I would ever be the person to spend more that $12 on blush, but I did and I'm not sad about it.) It's just beautiful! It's a great color and goes on easily and stays on. (I think it needs a touch up ever 8 hours, but I think that's to be expected.) I've purchased this item several times now and I'm going to continue to buy it..
customer_reviews.author: StLGal

customer_reviews.title: No staying power
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this - reviews said this color looks great on everyone. I disagree- looks a tad harsh on my fair skin. Also fades - needed to touch up twice during an 8-hour workday, even with a primer and a sealer
customer_reviews.author: Prairie Dove

customer_reviews.title: Even Meghan wears this!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this blush! And all my other NARS cosmetics. Long lasting. Flattering. Nicely priced.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Burchard

customer_reviews.title: nars blush
customer_reviews.text: ive used this product for many years. the color is the most flattering on me.
customer_reviews.author: victoria kolozian

customer_reviews.title: Love this blush!
customer_reviews.text: Love the orange color of this. Goes so beautifully with my Too Faced Milk Chocolate bronzer. Gives the perfect coloring for Summer and has a subtle shimmer that goes nicely with my illuminator too! I'm blonde with fair skin - love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Schneyder

customer_reviews.title: Best blush, best color!
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled to find a great blush for years: and Nars Orgasm, although undoubtedly expensive, certainly fits the bill of a great blush. Note to readers-- the "orgasm" color is brighter than pictured (visit Sephora or a similar store if you want to try the color out before hand) and has a bit of a shimmer to it. The color is GREAT, however, and really just gives you a healthy, natural glow. Great for women with fair skin. And the color goes on evenly and stays on all day! I'd highly suggest that if you splurge on one makeup product, splurge on this blush!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah S.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite blush
customer_reviews.text: I love NARS blushes. Have 3 different colors and love all 3.
customer_reviews.author: K. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on everyone!
customer_reviews.text: Me, my mom, and a few of my friends have all been using this blush for years, on all of our varying skintones. It really does look amazing on anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: NARS BLUSH IS THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite color... BUT, Nars blushes are the only ones I'll wear. I KNOW -- people love orgasm. I just have a different color that works better for my skin tone
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Yeaton

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice color, a little goes a long way. I'd say all day color.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Great color!
customer_reviews.text: Love this blush color. Shipping was great! Love this color and will never change!
customer_reviews.author: Kerri P

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to blush for my everyday make up routine. It goes on very light and has a hint of shimmer that highlights your cheekbones. Totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ceana Santori

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I am using my husbands account. I like this blush but not for the price. It's not any better than some of my other blushes. I do like it a lot. It;s a very pretty color but I would not buy it again because of the price. I don't have anything to negative to saya bout this blush other than the price because it is pretty. If it had been about 12 to 15 dollars cheaper then I would have give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Glitter beyond belief
customer_reviews.text: Using this product makes me look like Edward Cullen in the sun. If I had known I was ordering a product that contained mostly glitter and a little bit of blush, I wouldn't have ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: OnLyGoTEyEs4YoU

customer_reviews.title: NARS -GILDA
customer_reviews.text: I thought I ordered Lovejoy. This color is totally wrong for me😞
customer_reviews.author: Patty Little

customer_reviews.title: Quality is wonderful, compact lasts an eternity
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Nars Orgasm for years and it remains an old faithful still. Quality is wonderful, compact lasts an eternity, and the color is a beautiful pink/peach blend with the perfect amount of shimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: What's all the hype about?
customer_reviews.text: The blush has a strong gold shimmer and the pink-coral color just didn't work for me. I was hoping this would put an end to my quest for my perfect color. It comes in a very small case (about 3" × 2"). It doesn't include a brush.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Young

customer_reviews.title: Great color for fair skin
customer_reviews.text: I'm very fair skinned, and I really like this color. It goes on smoothly and it is easy to blend in to get it darker or lighter to suit my needs. I really like this product.
customer_reviews.author: bouga

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I have olive-colored skin, and this blush looks really natural on me. I absolutely love it. It is a nice change from all the pink-colored blushes out there. The formula works well for me - I don't need to put a lot onto the brush to get a good application onto my face. I am very happy with this purchase. I use the Bobbi Brown Blush Brush to apply.
customer_reviews.author: kr

customer_reviews.title: Orgasmic
customer_reviews.text: This blush looks good on everyone. For real. I'm pale and yellow undertones. Been using it for years and any time anyone needs to borrow blush they love it. Even my tan friends.
customer_reviews.author: FSshopper85

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Saw this product on a Wayne Goss tutorial, and I love it! It is so soft and natural looking on my skin. It has a bit of reflective property to it, which gives adds to the color of your cheeks. I also purchased the cream blush stick in this color as well, and it is great, too!
customer_reviews.author: Blue Eyed Girl

customer_reviews.title: The only blush I'll ever use!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite blush I have ever owned! I use it year round- it looks just as good on my paler, winter skin as it does my tan, summer skin!! Sometimes, the glitter is a little much so I lightly dust my face powder on top to tone it down. Its awesome to be able to get it so much cheaper on here than in stores!
customer_reviews.author: rachelkhays

customer_reviews.title: The gold standard in blush
customer_reviews.text: I finally spent the bucks to get this popular blush. It is gorgeous--looks natural, but gives me much needed color. Will stick with this blush from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Sparklepony

customer_reviews.title: The best color ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to blush for almost every outfit. It works well with my skin tone and really goes with any pink, red, peach, beige lipstick or whatever I'm wearing. It has a tiny subtle shimmer which is perfect. The only negative is that it will easily break up if dropped so be careful especially when traveling. Keep it in your purse or wrap in bubble wrap if you have to pack it.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great Blush!
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with my purchase of Nars Orgasm Blush . It comes in a nice hard cover case that protects the product. It applies beautifully ! I will definitely order again . The package arrived in a timely manner and was securely packaged...
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A Decker

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed. Also
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same as the one as I got from Ulta. So disappointed. Also, it has too much sparkle in it.
customer_reviews.author: Verna Adams

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I buy this all the time so I knew it was perfect. It is the original, not a fake. The price wasn't that much cheaper than in store but I just can't get to a Sephora or Ulta that easily so it's was easier to just order it.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for the past 3 years and I don't plan on changing anytime soon! I have very sensitive skin and this product does not irritated it
customer_reviews.author: sdr

customer_reviews.title: Great blush!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blush in Sin, instead of Orgasm and really like Sin the best! Orgasm was good, but a little too peachy for me and with too much shimmer. This one has no shimmer and is more of a berry color. I have pale skin with pink undertones and highly recommend Nars blush. The pigments in these blushes are beautiful and definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: DTL

customer_reviews.title: NARS Orgasm Blush lives up to the hype!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blush. It's worth the price (I paid $30) and lives up to the hype. The color works well on my fair skin. Gives a natural glow without being over powerful. Be aware that there are some sparkly bits.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of two

customer_reviews.title: Blush...perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love NARS and LOVE this shade. I've purchased before and run out. Couldn't wait to get this. It's just a blush to my barely tanned skin. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Sherry S.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like the color but a little too glittery for me. I'm still using it though.
customer_reviews.author: nelsonsatc

customer_reviews.title: Love this blush it's that color I've searched for along ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this blush it's that color I've searched for along time. Product is different than most blushes sheer light & blend able. If you apply to much easy to blend. Pretty warm pink. You'll love it! Sold on all nars products so far.
customer_reviews.author: leah

customer_reviews.title: overrated
customer_reviews.text: I have medium beige skin. This color did not show up on my skin at all. Maybe it is being made differently or maybe i received a bad batch but i will have to throw it out. The name "orgasm" might be a great marketing ploy for high ratings.
customer_reviews.author: california woman

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Attractive easy to apply peachy pink color. Well priced and lasts a decent amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous color. Good for evening wear due to a slight sparkle!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma and Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: Would be better without triclosan and phthalates.
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of this product though I could do without the triclosan and phthalates.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect color for my fair-color skin
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect color for my fair-color skin. Also, my skin is super sensitive and acne prone- I don't have any issues with irritation or break outs with this product. It's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great every day color
customer_reviews.text: African american medium complexion, looks great on me, I even use it when doing other people's make up.
customer_reviews.author: GODDESS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, universal color with a little golden glow; apply once in AM, finish with Urban Decay setting spray.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Hope

customer_reviews.title: Cracked shortly after purchase
customer_reviews.text: The blush cracked after two weeks. I never travelled with it just placed it in my makeup bag daily. I’m very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Martta Ensio

customer_reviews.title: Sparkly and sexy!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely shade of bright pink but not as deep a shade as I would have liked. Still, it's a fun color to wear when you wish to brighten up your cheeks and glow and shimmer in candlelight!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi256

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this blush so much that I just ordered another one!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Pridgen

customer_reviews.title: my favorite blush
customer_reviews.text: NARS blush in orgasm is the perfect blush for nearly every skin tone. Mind you this does have a glittery tone to it, so if that's not your thing, you may not be thrilled, but it gives a great peachy glow and a little product goes a very long way. I would recommend this product without reservations.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Gemme

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: The color is subtle but has a very strong effect. It is the most natural-looking brush I've ever worn. I bought it because I'd heard it was a "beauty staple," though I'd never tried it in the store. Very impressed and pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best color ever - I hope Nars doesn't discontinue it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary S.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this blush, the color is really flattering and I only need to use a small amount. I apply it every day and one contained lasts me over two years.
customer_reviews.author: C. Franco

customer_reviews.title: Great blush
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well known product. I believe that this color “orgasm” is probably the most popular color of this product. It works well on any skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Pony Girl

customer_reviews.title: feels nice
customer_reviews.text: this is my fav shade of blush... it don't wear it every day so it last me for months. Its a pinky peachy color... haha Feels nice and light.
customer_reviews.author: MamaZombie

customer_reviews.title: Hype
customer_reviews.text: This is a good blush, however, it was in no way as good as the hype the WJS gave it. Clinique is cheaper and just as good. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: bigD

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blush! It's the perfect color for just about any complexion. Not too rosy and not too peachy. A nice mix of the two. I'm very fair and this shows as just a very warm, peachy pink color on me. It lasts well as ou don't have to use a lot to get good color. I would recommend highly!
customer_reviews.author: Christylyn

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: This product was broken when I received it. There is a piece missing from the top so it was not due to delivery. It was broken when sent and unusable
customer_reviews.author: Bridget M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, poor staying power
customer_reviews.text: I love this color but I subtracted a star because it has quite a bit of gold glitter in it and doesn't last too long. It does blend nicely though and is flattering on most women. I think it's best on women with warm skin tones because if you're cool toned it will look pretty but not as natural as a more mauve blush.
customer_reviews.author: CORNB

customer_reviews.title: The color is splotchy and there is way too much ...
customer_reviews.text: The color is splotchy and there is way too much glitter! It’s a fake that doesn’t work. I ended up throwing it away after giving it several tries
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte

customer_reviews.title: Works on all skin tones
customer_reviews.text: I love this blush! Only wish I had purchased the bigger/regular size!
customer_reviews.author: Sonia R. Stiefel

customer_reviews.title: FAN FAVORITE
customer_reviews.text: My favorite blush! Fits my skin tone during any season. From tan to pale! I've received a lot of compliments. Not shimmery which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sage Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the color but probably more suitable for younger skin. It's very dramatic, needs to be blended well
customer_reviews.author: SJB

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Wrong color for my light skin tone and strawberry blonde hair as a blog suggested. I loved the feel and consistency of this blush big time.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nars Orgasm is a classic. This is my second one.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Coleman

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: Can we say it all together: Heavenly! The color is fantastic, it reminds me a little to Kevin Aucoin's FIRA. A blend of orange and red. A little goes a long way and it glides beautifully on the skin. Higly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: E747TX

customer_reviews.title: Super pigmented! Ive had it for a couple of ...
customer_reviews.text: Super pigmented! Ive had it for a couple of years and ive barely made a dent. The taj mahal color is so pretty and looks great on olive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Star Paper Moon

customer_reviews.title: Fave
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite blush. Outlaw is a perfect shade for me as I have a light/medium complexion. I think this shade works well if you are darker and/or have a nice tan. Nars has the best blush. I'm very happy. Definitely would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: nars is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love this blush. I am light skinned and wear mostly browns in make up. This is a light brown with a hint of shimmer. It is very nice for day wear. Not too overpowering. Goes on smooth, does not look cakey. Cant wait to try some other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Drexler

customer_reviews.title: Love, love orgasm
customer_reviews.text: I just love this blush color. The closest Sephora to me is a over a hour, so I was thrilled and wiry to find it on amazon. It is the real deal. I compared it to my amlost empty blush. Orgasm is the perfect color for spring and summer.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: A Fave, for Sure!
customer_reviews.text: One of my all time favorite blushes. Ever. The colour, pigmentation and payoff are stellar and once applied, it lasts on me all day. I have fair skin and this shade is perfect for me. I think that I need more NARS blushes!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Believe the Hype!!!
customer_reviews.text: There is a reason why this shade (Taj Mahal) is so popular. This is now my holy grail of blushes. You only need a small amount to achieve a beautiful, healthy, golden glow. This color compliments all skin tones and looks amazing on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kenlah0406

customer_reviews.title: Nice glow
customer_reviews.text: Like most people, I was sucked in by the cheesy name. The blush provides a nice glow a little more on the coral/pink side than posie/pink like it may seem from the photo. Wears well all evening and, true to name, gives a nice iridescent orgasmic glow ;-).
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kotzan

customer_reviews.title: The color is great!
customer_reviews.text: I love the gold sheen to this blush. The only down side is that the first ingredient is talc which is very drying.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Clemmensen

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've always had a hard time picking the right blush because I don't wear a lot of makeup and many blushes I've tried seemed to stand out too much for me. But this one is great. It's subtle, very light, and gives your cheeks a natural looking glow.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought Desire. It's a very pink, like bright bright pink blush. I only have to swipe once lightly with my brush and that's enough to make me look flushed. It was definitely a great buy and without the shimmer of usual blushes it looks extremely natural.
customer_reviews.author: allison898

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Blush is different for everyone, but I’m an olive skinned white girl and this color makes my cheeks look appropriately rosy!
customer_reviews.author: LlamaMama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: beautiful colors, looks very natural and does not clog the pores. Just gives the right amount of highlight on the cheeks. Very discreet.
customer_reviews.author: N. Defontnouvelle

customer_reviews.title: Fab!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so pleased with my latest experience with Amazon/NARS. My order arrived promptly and perfectly intact. Taj Mahal is my new go-to blush, and the best part is that the color payoff is high...one doesn't need much to achieve a natural look with this blush! I won't ever have to replace this one, it is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: YMS

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a repeat purchase of NARS Blush, Orgasm. Love this colour. It suits almost every complexion. Seller sells for a good price + free shipping. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: yvonnem

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding blush
customer_reviews.text: There is no blush like cars-esp this color. I also have the nars multiple in a stick form. It's a little more dewy on those days when you need it. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: LONGNANDLEGGY

customer_reviews.title: Best blush out there hands down
customer_reviews.text: Best blush out there hands down. the color is super flattering to my pale skin tone but also when I tan in the summer and my freckled come out. It also lasts FORVEVER and has a smooth silly texture to it.
customer_reviews.author: Bb Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and it's a little better price on amazon than at Sephora
customer_reviews.author: Barmon

customer_reviews.title: NARS Blush is always good
customer_reviews.text: Not the usual color I buy in NARS blush, but same great product that goes on well and stays on.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R. Vickers

customer_reviews.title: It really makes you feel good when applied
customer_reviews.text: This really is the best blush. The shade of pink combined with the gold sparkles gives you a glowing beautiful feeling. I highly recommend it and I have tried hundreds of beauty products
customer_reviews.author: Kristen M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice blush
customer_reviews.text: Nice blush. The color is a pink/coral. It is not as sheer as I was hoping for. Great seller!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: This is a great color of blush
customer_reviews.text: This is a great color of blush. It looks really natural on my skin and lasts ALL day. I have never had a blush last this long on my face. A++.
customer_reviews.author: M. Green

customer_reviews.title: No wonder it's a cult favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Great and very natural color, and very flattering to my extremely fair complexion.
customer_reviews.author: CocoMom

customer_reviews.title: The hype is real-get it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s worth the money and the hype is for real
customer_reviews.author: jessica hauswirth

customer_reviews.title: A lower quality product???
customer_reviews.text: I was really happy with this product when I first got it. The color was good and it lasted. I have used NARS blushes before so I knew what to expect as far as quality. I was so disappointed that after a few months of use the cake started flaking and then started disintegrating. As I stated before this has not happened with the other (much older) blush that I own. I am beginning to wonder if this is a fake, a lower quality product being sold under the name NARS.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa D

product_meta.title: NARS Blush, Orgasm 0.16 oz.
feature_bullets: The ultimate authority in blush, nars offers the industry's most iconic shades for cheeks
Natural, healthy-looking color that immediately enlivens the complexion
